title: [Boreas Ridge, Gregale Way]
description: Rows of tall boxwood have been formed into all manner of topiary fauna from throughout the lands here.  Two of these topiary beasts stand at attention flanking each manor's entry, ready to greet visitors.

Rows of tall boxwood have been formed into all manner of topiary fauna from throughout the lands here.  Two of these topiary beasts, illuminated by lanterns, stand at attention flanking each manor's entry, ready to greet visitors.
